fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- They may not perfom any night abilities for this night. You will then deal a Basic Attack to them the 2nd night.
- Only one player may be frozen at all times.
- If you exist in the game, there is a 1/108 chance a random other Rock will be rerolled into Odd Keystone. See, this role is functionally unique from any other role in the thread!
